subject: Tennis
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal became the first player in the Open era to win two tournaments seven times after beating David Ferrer, 7-6 (1), 7-5, in the Barcelona Open final in Spain.
snippet: Rafael Nadal became the first player in the Open era to win two tournaments seven times after beating David Ferrer, 7-6 (1), 7-5, in the Barcelona Open final in Spain.
